verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Saved, saved, saved
I’m happy on the way,
Saved, saved, saved

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I love Him more each day;
Saved, saved, saved
I know He’s mine each hour
He saved and keeps
and sanctifies me by His pow’r.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Since the Savior found me,
pardoned all my sin,
I have had the joy
and living hope within;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Gone is all the shame
and sorrow of the past
They’re underneath the precious blood of Christ at last.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Since the Savior found me,
all to Him I owe,
For His precious blood
has washed me white as snow;
Now no condemnation,
happy as can be-
I'm glad that Jesus justifies
and sets me free.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Since the Savior found me,
I have perfect rest,
Living in the realms of joy
and happiness;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Leaning on my Savior,
looking for that day
When He shall come to catch
His waiting bride away.
